about.details:
Incorporated in 1981, Sansera manufactures complex and critical precision engineered components and caters across automotive and non-automotive sectors. The company manufactures and supplies a wide range of precision forged and machined components and assemblies which are critical for the two-wheeler, passenger vehicle, and commercial vehicle verticals for the automotive sector. For the non-automotive sector, the company manufactures and supplies a wide range of precision components for aerospace, off-road, agriculture, and other segments. The company mostly supplies forged & machined products to OEM’s.

For FY’21, the Automotive sector contributed 88.45% and non-automotive 11.45% of the revenue. The company derives around 65% of its revenue from India and the rest 35% from other countries. The company is one of the major suppliers of connecting rods globally. The company has 15 manufacturing plants across India of which 9 are in Bangalore.

Competitive strengths

  • Leading supplier of complex and high-quality precision engineered components across automotive and non-automotive sectors which are poised to grow strongly.
  • A well-diversified portfolio of segments, products, customers, and geography.
  • Strong Engineering & Designing capabilities.
  • Strong relationships with respected Indian and Global OEM’s.
  • Strong financial performance.
  • Skilled and experienced management team.

faqs.question: What is the Sansera Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sansera Engineering IPO is a main-board IPO of 17244328 equity shares of the face value of ₹2 aggregating up to ₹1,282.98 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹744 per share. The minimum order quantity is 20.

The IPO opens on September 14, 2021, and closes on September 16, 2021.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sansera Engineering IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sansera Engineering IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sansera Engineering IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sansera Engineering IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sansera Engineering IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sansera Engineering IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sansera Engineering IPO opens on September 14, 2021 and closes on September 16, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sansera Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer: Sansera Engineering IPO lot size is 20, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,880.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sansera Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sansera Engineering IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sansera Engineering IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sansera Engineering IPO will be done on Tuesday, September 21, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, September 23, 2021. Check the Sansera Engineering IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sansera Engineering IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sansera Engineering IPO listing date is on Friday, September 24, 2021.
